anathema: Destroy healthy crops, waste food, refuse to help others in your community
edict: Encourage hard work that benefits all, ensure the health of crops and vegetation, always lend a hand when asked
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Jaidi (The Blessing and Bounty)](/Deities.aspx?ID=406)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 300

Jaidi, the Blessing and Bounty, was the Azlanti goddess of agriculture, hard work, and self-sufficiency. While primarily worshipped during the era of ancient Azlant society, artifacts dedicated to her were found in ancient ruins by Azlanti explorers, suggesting her existence for millennia prior. Most of her history and story of origin remains a mystery.

What is known is that Jaidi is the spouse of another god, [Erastil](/Deities.aspx?ID=282). The beginnings of their relationship are a matter of much speculation. Some say the two met during the Age of Creation, battling side by side against [Rovagug](/Deities.aspx?ID=291), starting an epic romance forged in the fires of battle. Others say the two agreed on a mutually beneficial arrangement to strengthen both churches’ beliefs in hard work and community to aid fledgling human society. Still more speak of a time that Erastil was a wild beast, lured in by Jaidi’s agriculture and tamed by her love.

Followers of the Blessing and Bounty often value hard work and find themselves in professions where they can benefit not only themselves, but entire communities. Some may take up adventuring to aid in rebuilding war-torn cities, but many spend their lives in humble service of their own town. Never ones to be called lazy, followers of Jaidi are often the first to volunteer in times of need and lean toward protective and defensive fighting styles.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Encourage hard work that benefits all, ensure the health of crops and vegetation, always lend a hand when asked

**Anathema** Destroy healthy crops, waste food, refuse to help others in your community

**Area of Concern**
Agriculture, hard work, self-sufficiency

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)

**Favored Weapon** [Scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=394)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=92)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=73), [Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=122)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Protector Tree](/Spells.aspx?ID=2015)

- **3rd**
[Wall of Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=1752)

- **5th**
[Nature's Pathway](/Spells.aspx?ID=1613)

</column>
name: Jaidi (The Blessing and Bounty)
